00025         CSystemBundle::CSystemBundle()
00026                 : m_exiting(false)
00027                 , m_eventServer(m_fwkLock, m_fwkEvent)

00029                 launcher_thread_id = boost::this_thread::get_id();

00034         void CSystemBundle::FinalConstruct(int argc, char *argv[], const char* settingsFile)
00035         {
00036                 THREAD_LAUNCHER();
00037 
00038                 CBundle::FinalConstruct(0, "System Bundle", this);
00039                 m_bundleRepository.Init(this);
00040         }

00044         void CSystemBundle::Resolve()
00045         {
00046                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00047 
00048                 m_state = eBndlState_Resolved;
00049         }

00053         void CSystemBundle::PreStart()
00054         {
00055                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00056 
00057                 CSystemBundleActivator* sba;
00058                 create_instance_impl(&sba);
00059                 sba->FinalConstruct(this);
00060                 m_activator = sba;
00061 
00062                 create_instance_impl(&m_context);
00063                 m_context->FinalConstruct(this, this);
00064 
00065                 m_state = eBndlState_Starting;
00066         }
00067 
00069 
00070         void CSystemBundle::PostStart()
00071         {
00072                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00073 
00074                 ASSERT_SOFT(m_state == eBndlState_Starting);
00075         }
00076 
00078 
00079         void CSystemBundle::Start()
00080         {
00081                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00082                 
00083                 {
00084                         scoped_lock l(m_fwkLock);
00085 
00086                         if(m_state != eBndlState_Starting)
00087                                 return;
00088 
00089                         m_exiting = false;
00090                         setState(eBndlState_Active);
00091 
00092                         m_fwkThread = boost::thread(boost::bind(&CSystemBundle::ThreadLoop, this));
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 PostFrameworkEvent(eFwkEvntT_Started);
00096         }
00097 
00099 
00100         void CSystemBundle::Stop()
00101         {
00102                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00103 
00104                 {
00105                         scoped_lock l(m_fwkLock);
00106                         m_exiting = true;
00107                 }
00108                 m_fwkEvent.notify_all();
00109         }
00110

00113         void CSystemBundle::Uninstall()
00114         {
00115                 throw "BundleException";
00116         }

00119         // Framework
00121 
00122         void CSystemBundle::Init()
00123         {
00124                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00125 
00126                 {
00127                         scoped_lock l(m_fwkLock);
00128 
00129                         if(     m_state == eBndlState_Starting || 
00130                                 m_state == eBndlState_Active ||
00131                                 m_state == eBndlState_Stopping)
00132                                 return;
00133 
00134                         m_eventServer.Start();
00135                 }
00136 
00138                 CBundle::Start();
00139         }
00140 
00142 
00143         void CSystemBundle::Shutdown()
00144         {
00145                 THREAD_FRAMEWORK();
00147 
00148                 // Activator will do all the work
00149                 CBundle::Stop();
00150 
00151                 m_eventServer.Stop();
00152                 m_eventServer.DeliverEvents();
00153         }
00154 
00156 
00157         SFrameworkEvent CSystemBundle::WaitForStop(long timeout)
00158         {
00159                 THREAD_ANY_USER();
00160 
00161                 if(timeout)
00162                 {
00163                         if(!m_fwkThread.timed_join(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(timeout)))
00164                                 return SFrameworkEvent(0, eFwkEvntT_WaitTimeout);
00165                 }
00166                 else
00167                 {
00168                         m_fwkThread.join();
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 return m_exitCode;
00172         }
00173 
00175 
00176         void CSystemBundle::ThreadLoop()
00177         {
00178                 fwk_thread_id = boost::this_thread::get_id();
00179 
00180                 while(!m_exiting)
00181                 {
00182                         {
00183                                 scoped_lock l(m_fwkLock);
00184                                 while(!m_exiting && !m_eventServer.HasPendingEvents())
00185                                         m_fwkEvent.wait(l);
00186                         }
00187 
00188                         m_eventServer.DeliverEvents();
00189                 }
00190                 
00191                 Shutdown();
00192         }

00235         void CSystemBundle::PostBundleEvent(IBundle *bndl, EBundleEventType e)
00236         {
00237                 THREAD_ANY();
00238                 VERBOSE("[%s] %s : %d", bndl->getLocation(), __FUNCTION__, (int)e);
00239 
00240                 CBundleEventDispatcher* disp = new CBundleEventDispatcher(SBundleEvent(bndl, e));
00241 
00242                 m_eventServer.SendEvent(m_bundleRepository.getSyncListeners(), disp);
00243                 m_eventServer.PostEvent(m_bundleRepository.getListeners(), disp);
00244         }
00245 
00247 
00248         void CSystemBundle::PostFrameworkEvent(EFrameworkEventType e)
00249         {
00250                 VERBOSE("[%s] %s : %d", getLocation(), __FUNCTION__, (int)e);
00251 
00252                 CFrameworkEventDispatcher* disp = new CFrameworkEventDispatcher(
00253                         SFrameworkEvent(static_cast<CBundle*>(this), e));
00254 
00255                 m_eventServer.PostEvent(m_listeners, disp);
00256         }
00257 
00259 
00260         void CSystemBundle::SendServiceEvent(IServiceReference* ref, EServiceEventType e)
00261         {
00262                 VERBOSE("[%s] %s : %d", getLocation(), __FUNCTION__, (int)e);
00263 
00264                 CServiceEventDispatcher disp(SServiceEvent(ref, e));
00265 
00266                 m_eventServer.SendEvent(m_serviceRegistry.getListeners(), &disp);
00267         }
